android.support.v4.media.session

Class MediaControllerCompat.PlaybackInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.media.session.MediaControllerCompat.PlaybackInfo
  • Enclosing class:
    MediaControllerCompat

    public static final class MediaControllerCompat.PlaybackInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds information about the way volume is handled for this session.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int PLAYBACK_TYPE_LOCAL
      The session uses local playback.
      static int PLAYBACK_TYPE_REMOTE
      The session uses remote playback.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAudioStream()
      Get the stream this is currently controlling volume on.
      int getCurrentVolume()
      Get the current volume for this session.
      int getMaxVolume()
      Get the maximum volume that may be set for this session.
      int getPlaybackType()
      Get the type of volume handling, either local or remote.
      int getVolumeControl()
      Get the type of volume control that can be used.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • PLAYBACK_TYPE_LOCAL

        public static final int PLAYBACK_TYPE_LOCAL
        The session uses local playback.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PLAYBACK_TYPE_REMOTE

        public static final int PLAYBACK_TYPE_REMOTE
        The session uses remote playback.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getPlaybackType

        public int getPlaybackType()
        Get the type of volume handling, either local or remote. One of:
        • PLAYBACK_TYPE_LOCAL
        • PLAYBACK_TYPE_REMOTE
        Returns:
        The type of volume handling this session is using.

      • getAudioStream

        public int getAudioStream()
        Get the stream this is currently controlling volume on. When the volume type is PLAYBACK_TYPE_REMOTE this value does not have meaning and should be ignored.
        Returns:
        The stream this session is playing on.

      • getVolumeControl

        public int getVolumeControl()
        Get the type of volume control that can be used. One of:
        • VolumeProviderCompat.VOLUME_CONTROL_ABSOLUTE
        • VolumeProviderCompat.VOLUME_CONTROL_RELATIVE
        • VolumeProviderCompat.VOLUME_CONTROL_FIXED
        Returns:
        The type of volume control that may be used with this session.

      • getMaxVolume

        public int getMaxVolume()
        Get the maximum volume that may be set for this session.
        Returns:
        The maximum allowed volume where this session is playing.

      • getCurrentVolume

        public int getCurrentVolume()
        Get the current volume for this session.
        Returns:
        The current volume where this session is playing.
